LanguageData.Alphabeaver.label: alphabeaver
LanguageData.Alphabeaver.description: A large beaver-like creature genetically engineered to harvest wood with machine-like efficiency. In the absence of specialized feed, these animals will enter a manic state that compels them to eat trees whole, and are likely to attack if disturbed.
LanguageData.Alphabeaver.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.Alphabeaver.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.Alphabeaver.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Cobra.label: cobra
LanguageData.Cobra.description: A large predatory snake. Cobras can be highly aggressive if provoked, and their bite injects toxic venom into the victim.
LanguageData.Cobra.tools.venomfangs.label: venom-fangs
LanguageData.Cobra.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Thrumbo.label: thrumbo
LanguageData.Thrumbo.description: A gigantic, graceful creature of unknown origin. The thrumbo is gentle by nature, but extremely dangerous when enraged. While its long fur is exceptionally beautiful, its hide is also incredibly resistant to damage. Its razor-sharp horn fetches a huge price.\n\nLegends say that an old thrumbo is the wisest creature in the universe - it simply chooses not to speak.
LanguageData.Thrumbo.tools.horn.label: horn
LanguageData.Thrumbo.tools.left_foot.label: left foot
LanguageData.Thrumbo.tools.right_foot.label: right foot
LanguageData.Thrumbo.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Tortoise.label: tortoise
LanguageData.Tortoise.description: This heavily armored land-dwelling reptile is known for its slow moving speed and surprisingly vicious bite. Because of its natural armor, it is tough to kill and can do serious damage during drawn-out melee fights.
LanguageData.Tortoise.tools.beak.label: beak
LanguageData.Tortoise.tools.head.label: head
